headline: Has The Market Overreacted To Adobe (ADBE) After Recent AI Competition Concerns?
summary: If you are wondering whether Adobe's current share price truly reflects what the business is worth, you are not alone. This article is built to help you connect the dots between the numbers and the valuation story. Adobe's shares last closed at US$301.07, with returns of 1.7% over the past 7 days, a 14.9% decline over the past 30 days, and returns of negative 9.7% year to date, negative 30.8% over 1 year, negative 18.8% over 3 years and negative 34.4% over 5 years. Recent coverage has...
